metadata.Title: CVE-2023-24291 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.Description:
[A crafted save file can cause a buffer overrun in Simon Tatham'sPortable Puzzle Collection]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-24291` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sgt-puzzles - 20230122.806ae71-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sgt-puzzles package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20230122.806ae71-2').
